requirements.description: each party shall at all times post a privacy policy on its website
the privacy policy describes how it collects, uses and shares information

type.summary: Describe Data Collection, Use, and Sharing

requirements.description: the privacy policy provides information about how an End User can opt out of interest-based advertising
the opt-out information includes online behavioral or mobile cross-app advertising

type.summary: Specify Types of Advertising for Opt-Out
